Articles.Content:
Hello!

I've played this game since really i think .10 or around that.

So i just found out about this forum and decided to join, I also heard there was like another crash here, what happened?

Hi Qwerty1999!

Wow, sounds like you've been digging around in KSP way longer than I have.

Not sure what you're referring to about "another crash." There was one while some time ago (Apr 2013 I think?)

Anyways, welcome to the forums!

~Claw

Hi Qwerty1999!

Wow, sounds like you've been digging around in KSP way longer than I have.

Not sure what you're referring to about "another crash." There was one while some time ago (Apr 2013 I think?)

Alrighty thanks

I've actually beat my personal record in fastest asteroid redirect lol

Thanks for replying!
